## 🧭 Objective:  
Guide students in integrating quantitative analysis into policy writing.

## ✍️ Prompt:  
Write a memo evaluating the effectiveness of international aid in post-conflict recovery. Use the chart above to support your recommendations.

## 📥 Load Data
```{r}
reconstruction <- read_csv("assets/datasets/post_conflict_reconstruction.csv")
ggplot(reconstruction, aes(x = year, y = aid_received, color = country)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Aid Received Over Time",
       x = "Year", y = "Aid (USD Millions)") +
  theme_minimal()
```
